Title in Brazil: Batman - The Dark Knight Rises
Original title: The Dark Knight Rises
Year of Production: 2012
Release Year in Brazil: 2012
Genre: Action
Length: 165min
Director: Christopher Nolan

Eight years have passed since Batman disappeared into the night and went from hero to fugitive. By taking the blame for the death of Harvey Dent, the Two Faces, The Dark Knight sacrificed everything for what he and Commissioner Gordon hoped to be the best. For a time the lie worked with crime in Gotham City being destroyed by anti-crime law Dent.

But everything will change with the arrival of a mysterious thief with interest. Far more dangerous, however, is the appearance of Bane, a masked terrorist whose cruel plans for Gotham seek after self-imposed exile from Bruce, but even using back his hood and his cape, Batman may be no match for Bane.
